org.apache.hcatalog.templeton.tool
Interface TempletonStorage

All Known Implementing Classes:
HDFSStorage, ZooKeeperStorage
public interface TempletonStorage

An interface to handle different Templeton storage methods, including ZooKeeper and HDFS. Any storage scheme must be able to handle being run in an HDFS environment, where specific file systems and virtual machines may not be available. Storage is done individually in a hierarchy: type (the data type, as listed below), then the id (a given jobid, jobtrackingid, etc.), then the key/value pairs. So an entry might look like: JOB jobid00035 user -> rachel datecreated -> 2/5/12 etc. Each field must be available to be fetched/changed individually.

saveField

void saveField(TempletonStorage.Type type,
               String id,
               String key,
               String val)
               throws NotFoundException
Save a single key/value pair for a specific job id.

Parameters:
type - The data type (as listed above)
id - The String id of this data grouping (jobid, etc.)
key - The name of the field to save
val - The value of the field to save
Throws:
NotFoundException

getField

String getField(TempletonStorage.Type type,
                String id,
                String key)
Get the value of one field for a given data type. If the type is UNKNOWN, search for the id in all types.

Parameters:
type - The data type (as listed above)
id - The String id of this data grouping (jobid, etc.)
key - The name of the field to retrieve
Returns:
The value of the field requested, or null if not found.

getFields

Map<String,String> getFields(TempletonStorage.Type type,
                             String id)
Get all the name/value pairs stored for this id. Be careful using getFields() -- optimistic locking will mean that your odds of a conflict are decreased if you read/write one field at a time. getFields() is intended for read-only usage. If the type is UNKNOWN, search for the id in all types.

Parameters:
type - The data type (as listed above)
id - The String id of this data grouping (jobid, etc.)
Returns:
A Map of key/value pairs found for this type/id.

delete

boolean delete(TempletonStorage.Type type,
               String id)
               throws NotFoundException
Delete a data grouping (all data for a jobid, all tracking data for a job, etc.). If the type is UNKNOWN, search for the id in all types.

Parameters:
type - The data type (as listed above)
id - The String id of this data grouping (jobid, etc.)
Returns:
True if successful, false if not, throws NotFoundException if the id wasn't found.
Throws:
NotFoundException

getAll

List<String> getAll()
Get the id of each data grouping in the storage system.

Returns:
An ArrayList of ids.
